metadata.description:
Step by step guide on how to buy Goerli ETH on @FaucetDAO1 since the ETH, ARBETH, OPETH gas fee is really high on Layerzero Testnet Bridge.
So let’s go in
→ Visit chainlist.org (http://chainlist.org/)
Add Polygon mainnet network and goerli eth testnet to your metamask wallet

 (https://global.discourse-cdn.com/aptoslabs/original/3X/e/f/ef1d7671032224f194ad06fa7f5b3a30059e2358.png)
→ Fund your metamask wallet with at least 10 $MATIC.
You can simply do this by buying some $MATIC on exchanges like Binance and transfer them to your wallet.
→ Fund your metamask wallet with at least 10 $MATIC.
You can simply do this by buying some $MATIC on exchanges like Binance and transfer them to your wallet.
→ Fund your metamask wallet with at least 10 $MATIC.
You can simply do this by buying some $MATIC on exchanges like Binance and transfer them to your wallet. → Fund your metamask wallet with at least 10 $MATIC.
You can simply do this by buying some $MATIC on exchanges like Binance and transfer them to your wallet. Then → Visit faucetdao.shop. Switch to polygon chain on your metamask wallet
• Connect your wallet.

 (https://global.discourse-cdn.com/aptoslabs/original/3X/4/0/4040dbce9fc33d90f101b5e97f971e6126efb6a9.jpeg)
→ Use the swap
Swap some 5 $MATIC to $FDT
$FDT would be used to bridge to Goerli ETH


 (https://global.discourse-cdn.com/aptoslabs/original/3X/1/3/132d6e76f21db13a60eabb4b1970ac7dfa6f813e.jpeg)
→ Use the Bridge.

Cross chain transfer $FDT to $GETH
• Click on "Bridge’’
• Click on “Allow the bridge to use your FDT” and approve it on your wallet.
• Click on “Bridge & Swap to Goerli” the fee is currently 5 $MATIC
Wait a few minutes and check your wallet.tutorial on how to buy Geth
metadata.name: TUTORIAL on how to buy Geth with less gas
